artist: designer: John R. Morgan; retailer: Sears, Roebuck and Co., Chicago
creditline: Gift of funds from Michael and Ann Birt
description: silver metallic outboard boat motor; sides of motor shaped like blimps with red and white "WATERWITCH" decals
inscription: Imprinted (side of each fuel tank): WATERWITCH [decal]; molded (atop housing for pull starter): WATERWITCH / SEARS ROEBUCK AND COMPANY / MODEL NO. M10 / SERIAL NO. / (engraved): 1629; and (instructions molded in relief for \"OILING ENGINE\" and \"GREASING GEAR CASE\")
medium: Steel, aluminum, rubber, wood, rope, pigment, paper decals
title: "Waterwitch" Outboard Motor
